price: क्या यह आतिथ्य उत्तम है या थोहड़ का वृक्ष?
arabic: أَذَٰلِكَ خَيۡرٞ نُّزُلًا أَمۡ شَجَرَةُ ٱلزَّقُّومِ

version.title: Hindi Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indian by Azizul-Haqq Al-Umary.

meta.transliteration: adhālika khayrun nuzulan am shajaratu al-zaqūmi
